text: visvasavantayinda, yudevvanda, sabiyinvarunda, kristiyanuvanda, (gindara namadina) majusivarunda, samanayan taba namadinnanda, adi (sæma denama, tamanma rju margayehi sitinnan yayi pavasannaha. ehet kavurun rju margayehi ætteya yanna) movun atare niyata vasayenma allah viniscaya dinadi tinduvak denu æta. (movunge kriyavan) siyalla allah niyata vasayenma avadhanaya karaminma sitinneya
